content.raw:
Hi,

‌

I am using the ignition citadel in my research project where we plan to design reinforcement learning algorithms on simulated robots. I was a gazebo-classic user and recently moved to the ignition gazebo as I found that the parallel computing is supported in the ignition gazebo.

‌

In the gazebo-classical, there are \[environmental variables\]\([http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=components&cat=get\_started](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=components&cat=get_started)\) where a user can specify the model and plugin paths, such as `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH` and `GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH`. What are the environmental variables for the ignition gazebo? I tried to insert my models and plugins in the sdf file. But when I launch `ign gazebo -v 3 xxx.sdf`,  I was told they could not been found.

‌

Can anyone help me with this? Thanks!
